# Pogorzel Warszawska railway station

| coordinates     =
| other           =
| opened          =
| closed          =
| operator        =
| services        =
| map_locator =
}}
Pogorzel Warszawska railway station is a railway station at Pogorzel, Otwock, Masovian, Poland. It is served by Koleje Mazowieckie.
References
*Station article at [http://www.kolej.one.pl/index.php?dzial=stacje&id=3822&okno=start kolej.one.pl]
